ExC_OpportunitySite_ItemStash_CatCrystal.li:
questDescription(askerIsNull==true)->一匹のねこがあなたのもとに地図のようなものを咥えてきました。地図には目印が付いており、[map_definite]から遠くない位置のようです。この場所には以下のねこ達の秘宝が隠されています。

[itemStashContents]

questDescription(asker_factionLeader==True)->[asker_label], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name], has informed us of a collection of valuable items worth [itemStashContentsValue] not far from us. The collection consists of:

[itemStashContents]

[asker_label] says that [allSitePartsDescriptionsExceptFirst]

LanguageData.ExC_OpportunitySite_ItemStash_CatCrystal: Intercepted communications indicate the item stash has been claimed by others. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
